name: RTF Factory
description: The RTF Factory creates RTF documents that can be quickly and easily extended with process data and ivy macro functions.

descriptions.value: The RTF Factory creates RTF documents that can be quickly and easily extended with process data and ivy macro functions.
Die RTF Factory erstellt RTF Dokumente, die schnell und mühelos mit Prozessdaten und ivy-Makrofunktionen erweitert werden können.
